message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: Employment working hour record must not be canceled already.
Employment working hour record must not be cancelled already.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_NUMBER_OF_HOURS_MANDATORY
message.locale: Number of hours must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_NUMBER_OF_HOURS_MAXIMUM
message.locale: Number of hours must not exceed %1d.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_START_DATE_NOT_EARLIER_THAN_EMP_START_DATE
message.locale: Employment working hour start date must not be earlier than employment start date.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_START_DATE_NOT_LATER_THAN_EMP_END_DATE
message.locale: Employment working hour start date must not be later than employment end date.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_INVALID_START_DAY
message.locale: Employment working hours must start on a Monday.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_DUPLICATE_START_DATE
message.locale: Employment working hours cannot exist with the same start date.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_WEEK_NUMBER_OF_DAYS_MANDATORY
message.locale: Number of days must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_WEEK_NUMBER_OF_DAYS_MAXIMUM
message.locale: Number of Days must not exceed 7.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_NUMBER_OF_HOURS_POSITIVE
message.locale: Number of hours entered must be greater than zero

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_WEEK_NUMBER_OF_DAYS_MINIMUM
message.locale: Number of days entered must be a positive value between 1 and 7

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New employment working hour details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Employment working hour details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_EMP_WORKING_HOUR_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Employment working hour details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.
